member.summary: The Non-Transparent-Framing as defined in RFC 6587.

member.summary: Automatically detects the format of the syslog message.

member.summary: The format as defined in RFC 5424.

member.summary: The format as defined in RFC 3164.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.SyslogMessageFormat.Legacy
member.summary: The legacy format with only the "<" PRI ">" as the syslog message header.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.SyslogMessageFormat.Plain
member.summary: No syslog message header is used. Whole message corresponds to the content of the property.

member.name: T:Rebex.Net.SyslogClient
member.summary: Represents a syslog client, which can send syslog messages to a syslog server.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.SyslogClient.DefaultPort
member.summary: Default syslog port number (514).

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.SyslogClient.DefaultTlsPort
member.summary: Default syslog port number for TLS connection (6514).

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.SyslogClient.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes an instance of the class and bind it to the specified syslog server.

member.name: E:Rebex.Net.SyslogClient.ValidatingCertificate
member.summary: Occurs when a certificate provided by the remote end needs to be validated.

member.summary: Gets or sets the LogWriter used by this object.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.SyslogClient.Settings
member.summary: Gets or sets the client settings.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.SyslogClient.Timeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the timeout for underlying socket.

remarks.p: Apart from -1 and 0 values, the minimal value is 1000. Setting this property to a value lower than 1000 will cause to be thrown.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.SyslogClient.Connect(System.String,Rebex.Net.SyslogTransportProtocol)
member.summary: Connects the client to the specified syslog server.
member.param: The server address - either a hostname or a dotted string address.
The transport layer protocol to use.

member.summary: Connects the client to the specified syslog server.

The transport layer protocol to use.

member.summary: Connects the client to the specified syslog server.
member.param: The server address - either a hostname or a dotted string address.
The transport layer protocol to use.

member.summary: Sends a message to the connected syslog server.

member.summary: Closes the connection and releases all associated resources.

member.summary: Asynchronously closes the connection and releases all associated resources.

member.summary: Provides data for event.

member.summary: Gets the exception which occurred while receiving syslog messages.

member.summary: Gets the endpoint which caused the error, or null (Nothing in Visual Basic) if unknown.

member.summary: Gets the related to the error.

member.summary: Specifies status codes for the class.

member.summary: Unknown cause of error. For more information see InnerException.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.SyslogExceptionStatus.MessageParsingError
member.summary: Syslog message parsing failed.

member.name: T:Rebex.Net.SyslogException
member.summary: Represents a syslog error.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.SyslogException.Status
member.summary: Gets the status code of the error.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.SyslogException.GetRawData
member.summary: Gets the received data; or null if it is not meaningful for this error.
member.returns: The raw data received over the connection; or null if not available.

member.name: T:Rebex.Net.SyslogMessage
member.summary: This class represents a Syslog protocol message (RFC 5424).

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.SyslogMessage.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new empty syslog message.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.SyslogMessage.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new syslog message.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.SyslogMessage.Facility
member.summary: Gets or sets the syslog message facility.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.SyslogMessage.Severity
member.summary: Gets or sets the syslog message severity.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.SyslogMessage.Timestamp
member.summary: Gets the timestamp part of the syslog message as supplied by the client. Only available for messages received by a syslog server.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.SyslogMessage.Hostname
member.summary: Gets or sets the hostname part of this syslog message.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.SyslogMessage.ApplicationName
member.summary: Gets or sets the application name part of this syslog message.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.SyslogMessage.ProcessId
member.summary: Gets or sets the process ID part of this syslog message.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.SyslogMessage.MessageId
member.summary: Gets or sets the message ID part of this syslog message.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.SyslogMessage.Text
member.summary: Gets or sets the message part of this syslog message.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.SyslogMessage.Encode(Rebex.Net.SyslogMessageFormat,System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: Encodes the message and returns its raw representation.
member.param: The format to be used to serialize the syslog message.
The encoding for message part (). Default is "iso-8859-1" (ISO 8859-1 or Latin-1) encoding.

member.name: T:Rebex.Net.SyslogMessageReceivedEventArgs
member.summary: Provides data for event.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.SyslogMessageReceivedEventArgs.Binding
member.summary: Gets the related to the message.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.SyslogMessageReceivedEventArgs.Message
member.summary: Gets the syslog message.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.SyslogMessageReceivedEventArgs.RemoteEndPoint
member.summary: Gets the remote endpoint from which this syslog message was received.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.SyslogMessageReceivedEventArgs.ReceivedTime
member.summary: Gets the date and time at which this syslog message was received.

member.name: T:Rebex.Net.SyslogServer
member.summary: Represents a syslog server that can receive syslog messages.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.SyslogServer.DefaultPort
member.summary: Default syslog port number (514).

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.SyslogServer.DefaultTlsPort
member.summary: Default syslog port number for TLS connection (6514).

member.name: E:Rebex.Net.SyslogServer.MessageReceived
member.summary: Occurs when a syslog message is received.

member.name: E:Rebex.Net.SyslogServer.ErrorOccurred
member.summary: Occurs when an error occurs while receiving syslog messages.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.SyslogServer.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes an instance of the class. Use one of the methods to bind the server to an endpoint.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.SyslogServer.LogWriter
member.summary: Gets or sets the LogWriter used by this object.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.SyslogServer.Bindings
member.summary: Gets a read-only collection of server bindings.
member.remarks: Use one of the or methods to modify binding collection.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.SyslogServer.Settings
member.summary: Gets or sets the server settings.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.SyslogServer.Bind(Rebex.Net.SyslogTransportProtocol)
member.summary: Binds the specified protocol listener to its default port on all network IPv4 interfaces.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.SyslogServer.Bind(System.Int32,Rebex.Net.SyslogTransportProtocol)
member.summary: Binds the server to the specified port on all network IPv4 interfaces.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.SyslogServer.Bind(System.Net.IPEndPoint,Rebex.Net.SyslogTransportProtocol)
member.summary: Binds the server to the specified endpoint.
member.param: An IP endpoint to listen on.

member.summary: Binds the server to an endpoint using specified settings.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.SyslogServer.Bind(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Rebex.Net.SyslogBinding})
member.summary: Binds the server to the endpoints using specified settings.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.SyslogServer.Unbind
member.summary: Unbinds server from all network interfaces.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.SyslogServer.Unbind(Rebex.Net.SyslogTransportProtocol)
member.summary: Unbinds server from endpoints used by the specified protocol.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.SyslogServer.Unbind(System.Int32)
member.summary: Unbinds server from endpoints listening on specified port.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.SyslogServer.Unbind(System.Net.IPAddress)
member.summary: Unbinds server from endpoints listening on specified address.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.SyslogServer.Unbind(System.Net.IPEndPoint)
member.summary: Unbinds server from the specified endpoint.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.SyslogServer.Unbind(Rebex.Net.SyslogBinding)
member.summary: Unbinds server from the specified endpoint, which uses specified protocol.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.SyslogServer.Start
member.summary: Starts the server.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.SyslogServer.Stop
member.summary: Stops the server.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.SyslogServer.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes the server object, releasing all listeners and sessions.

member.name: T:Rebex.Net.SyslogServerSettings
member.summary: Specifies syslog server settings.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.SyslogServerSettings.TlsParameters
member.summary: Gets or sets a TLS security parameters, which are applied for connections.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.SyslogServerSettings.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:Rebex.Net.SyslogClientSettings
member.summary: Specifies syslog client settings.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.SyslogClientSettings.Format
member.summary: Gets or sets the syslog message format.
member.remarks: Default is . See https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc5424 for details.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.SyslogClientSettings.Framing
member.summary: Gets or sets the syslog message transfer framing for the and protocols.
member.remarks: Default is Octet Counting framing. See https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6587#section-3.4.1 for details.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.SyslogClientSettings.Trailer
member.summary: Gets or sets a trailer data when is set to . If is set to null or empty array the 0x0A byte is used for trailer.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.SyslogClientSettings.RaiseEventsFromCurrentThread
member.summary: Specifies whether to raise asynchronous events from the current working thread or whether to raise them using a available when an asynchronous operation was started.
member.value: False (default) raise events using ; true to raise them directly from the current working thread.
member.remarks: Events of synchronous methods are always raised from the current working thread.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.SyslogClientSettings.Encoding
member.summary: Gets or sets the encoding for message part () of the syslog message. Default is "ISO-8859-1" (Latin 1) encoding.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.SyslogClientSettings.EmitUtf8Preamble
member.summary: Specifies whether to emit UTF-8 preamble (BOM) at the beginning of the message part. Null means default for the used , which is true for and false for all other formats.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.SyslogClientSettings.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
